name: Map of Southsun Cove
description: Complete preliminary survey map of the Consortium's new venture, Southsun Cove.

name: Map Fragment
description: A piece of a Consortium map that features the Hanto Trading Post in Trader's Green.

name: Empty Alchemical Bottle
description: This bottle belongs to Gukumatz. Use it to gather and combine alchemical ingredients.

name: Alchemical Potion
description: The alchemist Gukumatz says this potion has strong dissolving capabilities. Researcher Levvi in Lion's Arch will be keenly interested in this.

name: Mysterious Soggy Bag
description: Part of the Consortium cargo that washed ashore.
